scripts.generate: yarn truffle compile && yarn typechain --target truffle-v5 "./build/**/*.json" && yarn typechain --target web3-v1 "./build/**/*.json"
scripts.prepare: yarn generate && cd subgraph && yarn && cross-env NETWORK=kovan yarn codegen
scripts.verify: cross-env-shell truffle run verify Proxy MoneyMarket SyntheticFlowProtocol SyntheticFlowToken SyntheticLiquidityPool MarginLiquidityPool SimplePriceOracle MarginFlowProtocol --network $NETWORK
scripts.lint: yarn solhint 'contracts/**/*.sol' && yarn eslint --ext .js,.ts subgraph && yarn tsc --noEmit --pretty
scripts.change-owner: cross-env-shell NETWORK=$NETWORK yarn truffle exec dev-scripts/changeOwners.js --network $NETWORK
scripts.upgrade-contracts:kovan: cross-env-shell CONTRACT_NAME=$CONTRACT_NAME NETWORK=kovan yarn truffle exec dev-scripts/upgradeContract.js --network kovan
